snippet: The company plans to disclose that it has raised the price range for its initial public offering to $66 to $68 for each American depositary share.
abstract: The company plans to disclose that it has raised the price range for its initial public offering to $66 to $68 for each American depositary share.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Alibaba Raises Fund-Raising Target for I.P.O. to $21.8 Billion
headline.print_headline: Alibaba Raises the Fund-Raising Target for Its I.P.O. to $21.8 Billion
